verses.roman:
'madhyama-āvāsa' kṛṣṇera--ṣaḍ-aiśvarya-bhāṇḍāra
ananta svarūpe yāhāṅ karena vihāra

synonyms: madhyama-āvāsa—the middle residence; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ṣaṭ-aiśvarya-bhāṇḍāra—the storehouse of six opulences; ananta sva-rūpe—in unlimited forms; yāhāṅ—where; karena vihāra—enjoys His pastimes.
translation: "The spiritual sky, which is full in all six opulences, is the interim residence of Lord Kṛṣṇa. It is there that an unlimited number of forms of Kṛṣṇa enjoy Their pastimes.
